description:
Description
===========
As newton-3 is released, ironic has now support vlan network through neutron.
Securitygroup is supported too.
So we should update support matrix

Links
this bug track the feature.
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ironic/+bug/1526403
title: Support-matrix of ironic for vlan should be updated

So we should update support matrix

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/355152
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
There are no currently open reviews on this bug, changing
the status back to the previous state and unassigning. If
there are active reviews related to this bug, please include
links in comments.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: Automatically discovered version newton in description. If this is incorrect, please update the description to include 'nova version: ...'
